delivery.cartCompleted: Order for Shopping Cart is completed.

delivery.invoiceConfirmationEmailText:
Your invoice has been paid.
We will send a confirmation email to your address and you will be redirected to the seller's website
delivery.trialText:
Your trial has been started.
You will receive the product within minutes, check your email!
delivery.subscriptionText:
Your subscription is now active.
You will receive an email with the confirmation of your purchase and a receipt soon.
delivery.invoiceProductText:
Your invoice has been paid.
You will receive the product within minutes, check your email!

service.noServiceText: This product has no service text, please wait further actions by the seller or open a ticket on his page.

subscription.title: Subscription Purchase
sentToEmail: subscriptions are sent directly to your email, please check for an email sent by
to get your product and/or get in touch with the business.
subscription.note: If you need help, please refer to the merchant's contact page using the button below. You can also access our customer billing portal to manage the active subscriptions in your name.
subscription.return: You can now return to the merchant's website, where the subscription will be active soon. If you need help, please refer to the merchant's contact page using the button below. You can also access our customer billing portal to manage the active subscriptions in your name.
